Articles.Content:
I heard there is an option in the settings menu to make closest approach always shown but I cant seem to find it.  Basically what is happening to me is if the target is around the Mun with a circular 20km orbit and I set my PE at 22km the intercept will not show up but if I burn down to 19km and cross the orbit it will finally show.   Please help!!!

Edited October 29, 2016 by Nich

Hi nich! First, I am not entirely sure if you are looking for this but I know if you right click on the closest approach in Map View once you *do* have an intercept, it will stay on display until you click again. However, in the settings you can change your conics view and number of predicted orbits (they tend to be less accurate the further out they are in time, so be careful).

 

Second, I will be moving this thread to the Questions subforum!
